course.title: CSI 7314 Advanced Topics in Object-Oriented Systems (3 units)
course.desc: Advanced object-oriented software engineering, in particular the issues of reuse and testing. Sample topics include: interaction modeling; class and cluster testing; traceability; design patterns and testing; the C++ standard template library. Students will carry out research. This course is equivalent to COMP 6104 at Carleton University.Course Component: Lecture
